140b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur
141a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'gyur/ gong mar 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par bdun par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas rnam pa thams cad kyim/
141a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rngon pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam du sems so// 'dod na brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam pa ji lta bus skad cig thang ci gsud tsam gi las rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa /
141a3(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob cing snyoms par yang 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
141a4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
141a5(mdo sde): phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas
141a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
141a7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu/
141b1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi brgal bar gnas par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul med kyi bskal pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang byi
141b2(mdo sde): ma'i mthar rab tu 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis chos kyi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
141b3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kun tu ston pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag
141b4(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kun tu ston pa'i brtson 'grus rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par ca
141b5(mdo sde): gyi rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam mig gam spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am/ bkod pa 'am/ byin gyi rlabs sam/
141b6(mdo sde): mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i ji skad pa steng dusas grang bar sla ba ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / mabyon/
141b7(mdo sde): ba dang ta da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang dag gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag mdor bshad pa/
142a1(mdo sde): bstan pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs med mu med pas bstan kyang thug pa med par shes par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni rim gyis/
142a2(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs pas rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song bar blta'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni klung gi
142a3(mdo sde): rgyun gyi sgo bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu ngoms par byas nas kyang mi zad la/ yang rnam par 'phel te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan par gyur cing rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du zhan par/
142a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ chu de ni thog ma nas mtsho chen po las mngon du phyogs pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi mtsho chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu yang smon lam chen
142a5(mdo sde): po'i 'bab chu'i rgyun gyi sgo bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams kun tu ngoms par byas nas kyang mi zad la/ yang rnam par 'phel te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan par
142a6(mdo sde): gyur cing / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mthun pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chung na thog ma nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshatshan po la
142a7(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs pa yon no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brten nas yod par gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di su ste dper na/ mtshan
142b1(mdo sde): po la brten nas ri'i rgyal po chen po bcu yod par gyur pa 'di lta ste ra'i rgyal po chen po gangs ri dang spos kyi dang ldang dang rnam par 'dal ba dang drang srong ridang / gna' shing 'dra/
142b2(mdo sde): dang rngarna ri dang / sa 'dzin dang / khor yug dang / rtog can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la 'di lta ste dper na ka ri'i rgyal po chen po gangs ri ni sman gyi rnam pa
142b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sman gyi rnam pa thams cad blangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang
142b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i snyan dngags dang bstan chos dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i snyan dngags dang / bstan
142b5(mdo sde): bcos dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa thams cad 'don pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngad ldang ni spos kyi rnam pa
142b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ spos kyi rnam pa thams cad blangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa la gnas pa'i byang
142b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang / spyod pa thams cad
143a1(mdo sde): kyi spos kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing rin po
143a2(mdo sde): che'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad blang bas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas
143a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/
143a4(mdo sde): yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shegs pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams
143a5(mdo sde): kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/
143a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams bgrang bas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sgras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od
143a7(mdo sde): 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang lam dang lam ma yin pa gzhan gyi khyad par thams cad shes pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa gzhan gyi
143b1(mdo sde): par thams cad shes pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin ni dngos rin po che
143b2(mdo sde): 'ba' shig yin zhing gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i
143b3(mdo sde): sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu sbyang dka' la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad
143b4(mdo sde): kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal
143b5(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing 'bras bu'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa thams cad blang
143b6(mdo sde): bas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon du gyur pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug
143b7(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu dang / mngon par rtog pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/
144a1(mdo sde): dper na/ ri'i rgya pos pos 'dzin ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa
144a2(mdo sde): thams cad bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab bstan
144a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang / mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na
144a4(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po chen po khor yug ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa rnams bgrang ba sa thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyalaba'i
144a5(mdo sde): sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
144a6(mdo sde): rnam par dbye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rtog dang ldan pa ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing
144a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems
144b1(mdo sde): dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can gyi 'jug pa dang / ldog pa thams cad shes pa'i spyod pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
144b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin
144b3(mdo sde): zhing lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa/
144b4(mdo sde): chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
144b5(mdo sde): 'phrin las yang dag par bstan pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i ri de dag gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po smos la/
144b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen pos kyang rab tu phye ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smos la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis kyang
144b7(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bags kyis gzhol ba dang /
145a1(mdo sde): shi ba'i ro dang mi gnas pa dang / chu gzhan gyi grangs spangs pa dang / ro gcig pa dang / rin po che mang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / yangs shing tshan
145a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'byung po chen po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / dus chad pa las mi 'da' ba dang / sprin chen po'i char thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang
145a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la smon lam chen po rims kyis
145a4(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrubs pas gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi shi ba'i ro dang mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la/
145a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa'i gdags pa'i grangs spangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro can la sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu sbyang dka'
145a6(mdo sde): la thabs dang mngon par shes pa tshad med pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon du gyur pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
145a7(mdo sde): rab tu rtogs pas zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la blos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yangs shing tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba
145b1(mdo sde): la bkod pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa kun tu bstan pas 'byung po chen po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros can la rnam par thar pa zab mos 'gro ba'i/
145b2(mdo sde): spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pas dus chad pa las mi 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i sprin gyi char thams cad kun tu
145b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po gang gi tshe rin po che'i rigs bcu las shin tu 'das/ mngon par spags par gyur
145b4(mdo sde): mgur ba mkhas pas legs par bsregs leg par bcos/ leg par sbyangs legs par byi dor byas te/ legs par phug cing / rin po che'i skud pas legs par btags la/ nor bu rin po
145b5(mdo sde): che bai DUR+Ya'i rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba mthon po'i rtse mo la btags te/ thams cad 'od rab tu 'byung zhing rgyal pos bsngag par gyur pa de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyis rin po che thams cad
145b6(mdo sde): bsdu bar bya bar nye bar gnas pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa/ 'phags
145b7(mdo sde): pa'i rigs bcu las shin tu 'das pa bskyed par gyur/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis legs par
146a1(mdo sde): bsregs/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas legs par bcos/ lam gyi yan lag gi rnam pas legs pa sbyangs// thabs dang mngon
146a2(mdo sde): par shes pas legs par byi dor byas te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas legs par phug cing / thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogs kyi srad bus legs par btags la/ dbang gi nor bu rin
146a3(mdo sde): po che chen po bai DUr+ya'i rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba'i rtse mo la btags te/ sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu brtags pa dang / thos pa'i shes pa'i 'od rab tu 'byung bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs
146a4(mdo sde): pa chos kyi rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rin po che thams
146a5(mdo sde): cad bsdu bar bya bar nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam pa thams cad du thams
146a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grog par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa
146a7(mdo sde): grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag
146b1(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus/
146b2(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ji snyed par rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshogs mngon par
146b3(mdo sde): phyogs pa yang de tsam du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sra rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di ni
146b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyan pa 'am/ mos par bya ba 'am/ gzung bar yang mi nus na bsgom pa'i rnam pa'i sbyor bas brtson par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kye rgyal ba'i
146b5(mdo sde): sras de bas na gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos te/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang /
146b6(mdo sde): ldan par shes par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
146b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu
147a1(mdo sde): ldag/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'u 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur bur ro// chem tsham/ rab tu
147a2(mdo sde): chem chem kun tu rab tu chem mo// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i sprin gi char mngon par bab bo// lha'i gos kyi sprin dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin dang /
147a3(mdo sde): lha'i rgyan gyi sprin dang / lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / lha'i ba dan gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha'i rol mo'i sprin dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi
147a4(mdo sde): char mngon par bab bo// lha'i las shin tu 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la mngon par stod pa'i glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra grag go// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 'phrul dbang
147a5(mdo sde): byed kyi gnas su lha'i dbang po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang gi nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i khang pa na ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di phyogs bcu mtha'
147a6(mdo sde): yas par byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing lpags te
147a7(mdo sde): lhags nas kyang 'di skad ces kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid brjod pa 'di legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mtshan
147b1(mdo sde): mthun pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'dir lhags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
147b2(mdo sde): thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rnam pa 'di 'dra ba dag la tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / khong du chud par byed pa 'di dag nyid dang / don 'di dag brjod pa dag gis chos
147b3(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad med par byung bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
147b4(mdo sde): bdag cag ji ltar phyin pa bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med
147b5(mdo sde): khang gi nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i khang par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' phyin par gyur to zhes zer ro// de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste/ byang
147b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
147b7(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma pa'i 'khor de dang / bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon
148a1(mdo sde): pas zhag bdun pa gnyis pa'i tshe/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang na/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang na nor bu rin po che'i snying pa'i khang pa na bzhugs pa yang
148a2(mdo sde): thugs yid rangs te/ byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
148a3(mdo sde): rgya gar skang du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha b+hU mi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
148a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang chen po kho 'bu mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/ 'jig rten
148a5(mdo sde): gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od gzer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam pa phye ba tshad med pa rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum pa thams
148a6(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin ga
148a7(mdo sde): pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su song ba/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya
148b1(mdo sde): chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos bsta pa/ sems can thams cad/
148b2(mdo sde): kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa bas lhag
148b3(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bkod pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa chen po nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par
148b4(mdo sde): thar pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la rten pa na
148b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar 'dzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas
148b6(mdo sde): gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid bsnyes pa/ sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i rtogs pa thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bsam
148b7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/
149a1(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' de/ chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/ rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye
149a2(mdo sde): shes yang dag par bslangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa/ dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres pa'i rnam par thar mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/
149a3(mdo sde): mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/ nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de
149a4(mdo sde): nyan thos tshad pa'i dge 'dun thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sras sems shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ tshul khrims shin tu rnam par
149a5(mdo sde): grol ba/ chos 'dod pa rnams bde bar phrad pa/ thos pa mnga' ba/ thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ legs par bsam pa sems pa/ legs par smra ba brjod pa
149a6(mdo sde): legs par bya ba'i las byed pa/ shes rab myur ba/ shes rab mgyogs pa/ shes rab rno ba/ nges par byung ba'i shes rab/ nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab can/ shes rab che ba
149a7(mdo sde): shes rab yangs pa/ shes rab zab pa/ shes rab mnyam pa med pa/ shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa/
149b1(mdo sde): yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po// spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa chen po dang ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag dang / byang
149b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad nas du rab tu med pa thams cad kyang gnas chen po la yang dag par
149b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi nges par byung ba/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bskul pa dang bskal pa ma yin par rnam par rtogs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud
149b4(mdo sde): phyir rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la byed pa las ring du gyur pa/ chen po'i chos kyi ro'i dga' ba/ bde bas nye bar brtan pa
149b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bgrod pa gcig tu gyur pa can/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sa mngon du gyur pa sha stag dang
149b6(mdo sde): thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa shin tu 'dus pa chos lngas sangs rgyas kyi sa bsdus pa yin te/
149b7(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i
150a1(mdo sde): gas kyisas/ sbya ngas pa rnal tshus gyu sa rnam par dag pan/ dab rnamam ldan gzums su gyur pa sna chags rnam/
150a2(mdo sde): pa thams cadas kun na yod kyang das brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing sna tshogs ma yin te ro gcig go// de bzhin du ra bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang / sa
150a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing sna tshogs ma yin te ro gcig go// shin tu 'dus pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na namakha' ni gzugs su mur
150a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la tha ma dad par zhugs kyang gzugs kyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mgos so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang / sems can
150a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang sems mnyam po nyid kyi yongs su grub pas tha mi dad par zhugs kyang sems can gyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'di lta ste/ dper nanam mkha' ni lus dang
150a6(mdo sde): gA dang / yid kyi las su gyur pa thams cad kyi go 'byed kyang nam mkha' ni tshul ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
150a7(mdo sde): dbyings rnam par dag pa yang ye shes dang sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyis go 'byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du
150b1(mdo sde): byed pa yang med do/ 'di la smra dper na nam ma'ab la gzugs kyi skye ba yang snang / 'jigs pa yang snang ste/ de la nam mkha' ni skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// de bzhin du
150b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cho gyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang ye shes dang sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba bsgrub pa thams cad kyi skye ba yang snang / 'jig pa yang snang ste
150b3(mdo sde): de la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyi 'phel ba yang snang bgri/
150b4(mdo sde): pa yang snang ste/ nam mkha' la ni 'phel ba yang med 'grib pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
150b5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i snying ku 'phel ba yang snang / nub pa yang snang ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni 'phel ba yang med/ 'grib pa yang med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'
150b6(mdo sde): mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la phyogs bcu na gzugs su gyur pa/ g.yo ba rnams mtha' yas mu med kyang / nam mkha' ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/
150b7(mdo sde): 'gul ba med do// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la/ phyogs bdu na sems can
151a1(mdo sde): la phan pa nye bar gnas pa phan pa mtha' yas mu med kyis/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/ 'gul ba med do// 'di/
151a2(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig pa yang snang / chags pa yang snang ste/ nam mkha' ni 'jig pa yang med chags pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
151a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos kyis dbyings rnam par dag pa la/ rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag tu med pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing / mngon
151a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang med yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs su gyur pa nam mkha' la rten pa dag la/ snang ba dang / 'dul ba dang
151a5(mdo sde): 'tshig pa dang / skam par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs kyang / nam mkha' ni de dag gis 'gyur ba yang med la yongs su skyo ba yang med do// de bzhin du sems can gyi khams de bzhin gshegs/
151a6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rten pa la bslab pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las log par sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs kyang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni
151a7(mdo sde): de dag gis 'gyur ba yang med la yongs su skyo ba med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rten pa'i sa chen po yang dmigs ri chen po sna tshogs dang / me snang ba dang / bya rgyu ba dag dang /
151b1(mdo sde): nyim dang / zla ba rgyu ba dag kyang dmig kyang dmigs te nam mkha' ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la tshul khrims
151b2(mdo sde): dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag kyang dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ni dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin
151b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan dag las yang dag par byung ba/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dmigs
151b4(mdo sde): te nam mkha' ni de la rtsol ba yang med mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gsheg pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs
151b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa dag ni dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// shin tu 'dus
151b6(mdo sde): pa me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la brten nas gzugs brnyan dag 'byung ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes
151b7(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas skye mched dang / de'i yul dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag snang ngo // de lta bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs
152a1(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa mnyam ste/ des na me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de bas na me long gi 'khor de ni de'i dper rig par bya'o// 'di
152a2(mdo sde): lta ste dper na mi bsod nams 'dod pa la la zhig gis skyon bsal ba dang yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir/ skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rang gi lus kyi skyon dang yon tan la so sor
152a3(mdo sde): rtog par bya ba'i ched du me long gi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas bzang por mi 'gul bar bzhag pa ltar/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba ra bsal zhing bskyed pa'i phyir/ sems can dpag
152a4(mdo sde): tu med pa grangs med pa ji snyed pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la so sor rtog par bya ba'i ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings
152a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i gnas su bzhags pas rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyi phyir mi g.yo ba yang de dang 'dra'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor legs par phyis pa gsal zhing rnam par
152a6(mdo sde): dngas la g.ya' med pa ni/ kun tu lam med thal lo lhang nge'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma gsal ba de la rten
152a7(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bzungs pas shin tu sbyangs pa gsal zhing rnam par dang la/ rnyog pa med pa yang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ kun tu lham mthal
152b1(mdo sde): le lhung po'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs kyi rkyen la ltos nas gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
152b2(mdo sde): kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can gyi dus kyi rkyen la ltos na/ shes pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor gzugs
152b3(mdo sde): bstan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag 'byung yang / de dag me long gi dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la me long gi dkyil 'khor de rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa
152b4(mdo sde): yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag 'byung yang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag
152b5(mdo sde): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la me long lta bu'i ye shes de rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na me le
152b6(mdo sde): gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de dag mi mnye ba dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro//
152b7(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang shes pa'i gzugs pa rnya ma ba du rnam pa sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin
153a1(mdo sde): mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de dag mi nye ba dang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor dros thams cad nas legs par
153a2(mdo sde): phyis pa'i mdun dang zur dang rgyab kun nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam pa yongs su ma chad cing tshad med pa
153a3(mdo sde): kun nas shin tu sbyangs pa yang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang
153a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams rang sangs rgyas theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po pa rnams theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
153a5(mdo sde): pa'i shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang / theg pa chen po pa'i shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams kyi rgyu mtshan du
153a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la 'di lta ste/ sa dang ri dang / shing dang khyim dang gzhal med khang chen po'i gzugs brnyan chen po dag dmigs te/
153a7(mdo sde): me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i tshad ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/
153b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar gyi ye shes kyi gzug brnyan dag kyang dmigs/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs pa rnyan dag kyang dmigs
153b2(mdo sde): me long lta bu'i ye shes la ni tshad yongs su chad pa gang yang med do// 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgribs pa'i gi murnas kyis gru brnyan srung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi
153b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos zin pa/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan pas bsgribs pa dag gi shes pa'i
153b4(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mun pa'i nang du zhag pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung
153b5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can nyes par spyod pa la dga' ba/ ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams kyi shes
153b6(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni ha cang bskal ba'i yul na 'dug pa'i gzugs rnams
153b7(mdo sde): kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang / sems can chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par ma dag
154a1(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa rnams dang / 'dod pa can ma yin pa dag gi shes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
154a2(mdo sde): tu 'dus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni yongs su grub pa rnam pa bcu las rig par bya ste/ mtshan ma dang bdag po dang / dga' ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang
154a3(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyams su myong ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang / mtshan nyid dben pa can mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa lnga
154a4(mdo sde): dang yongs su skyob pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / yal bar mi 'dor ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang
154a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du gzugs kyi sku kun tu ston pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / sems can thams cad kyis gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig mnyam pa nyid
154a6(mdo sde): yongs su grub pa las dang / 'jig rten nye bar zhi ba ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / 'jig rten gyi chos bde ba dang sdug bsngal ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub/
154a7(mdo sde): pa las dang / yon tan shin tu bskyed pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las so// shin tu 'dus pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams
154b1(mdo sde): ni sems can gyi khams kyi gnas yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mar rtog pa'i ye shes dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dag gi sgo dang / so sor yang dag par rigs pa
154b2(mdo sde): dang spobs pa bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni cig car sems can rnams kyi rnam par ri ma pa sna tshogs can gyi
154b3(mdo sde): rgyu yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang / cig car shes pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rig pa rnam sna / tsan b+h+yo rgyu yin
154b4(mdo sde): na'adi lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba sna tshogs de dag gis lam med thal le lgang nge'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs/
154b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa nyams
154b6(mdo sde): dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag gis lam me thal le lgang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na 'di lta ste/ gling bzhi pa dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
154b7(mdo sde): dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris la sogs pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no//
155a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgud pa dang rgyu dang 'bras/
155a2(mdo sde): bur bcas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa ma lus pa la so sor rtog pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no// 'di lta ste/
155a3(mdo sde): dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can gyi longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
155a4(mdo sde): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bstan pas/ chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang
155a5(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i 'gro/
155a6(mdo sde): ba lnga po rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag snang ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
155a7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i khams gsum po rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rte gyi khams
155b1(mdo sde): na ri rab la sogs pa rin po che'i ri dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i chos rgya
155b2(mdo sde): chen po ston pa dag snang ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po zab pa mi 'khrug pa dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
155b3(mdo sde): la yang mu stegs dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i chos ston pa dag snang ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni ri khor yug chen po rnams kyis kyang kun nas yod/
155b4(mdo sde): su bskor ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun tu
155b5(mdo sde): rmongs pa med pa'i ri rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ro// shin tu 'dus pa bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las rtsol ba las
155b6(mdo sde): byung ba des/ sems can rnams zhing las dang / tshong byed pa dang / rgyal po'i zham ring byed pa la sogs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba
155b7(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las rtsol ba lasu byu das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can las dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad kyis rgyags shing dregs pa rnams la/ las
156a1(mdo sde): dang bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar bstan nas zil gyis mnan te/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang / sems can rnams bstan pa la dad par mdzad yongs su smin par
156a2(mdo sde): mdzad rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba des sems can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la yongs su/
156a3(mdo sde): spyod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can so so'i/
156a4(mdo sde): skye mched du skyes par gyur pa rnams la skye ba mnyam pa nyid nye bar ston par mdzad cing ris mthun pa yongs su spyod pa mnyam pa nyid bstan pas kyang / sems can rnams dbang du mdzad nas
156a5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa des kyang bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las nyams su myong
156a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams la legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub
156a7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shesasku sprul pa'i 'phrin las sku nyams su btar bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang dka' ba spyod pa thams
156b1(mdo sde): cad su nyams su btar ba yang dag par bstan pas sems can rnams dad par mdzad nas / thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bsan pa la 'dzud par ma dang / yongs su sbyin
156b2(mdo sde): bar mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can gyi ngag gi las yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams phan tshun smra zhing kun tu smra la so so
156b3(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
156b4(mdo sde): don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po thos pa tsam gyis kyang / sems can byis pa'i shes rab can dad par byed pa'i chos ston pa la rab tu 'jug cing / thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams
156b5(mdo sde): babastan pa la 'dzus mas/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las sbyor bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams phan tshun du
156b6(mdo sde): bya ba dag la rnam par sbyor bar byed do// der 'khrul pa la rnam par smod/ ma 'khrul pa la bstod cing 'bod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsung sprul pa
156b7(mdo sde): 'phrin las sbyor bar 'gyur des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag pa'i bslab pa 'cha' bar mdzad la de la bag med pa la ni smod/ bag yod pa la ni bstod cing dad pa'i rjes su
157a1(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'azang ba la sogs pa'i gang zag rnam par 'jog pa dag kyang mdzad la/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdza/
157a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las yang dag par go bar 'gyur ba des kyang sems can rnams phan tshun du don bye brag tu/
157a3(mdo sde): mi shes pa bye brag tu shes par byed cing / snyun dngags dang bstan bcos rnams kyang yang dag par rjod par byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes
157a4(mdo sde): gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las yang dag par go bar byed pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi the tsom gyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa dag zlog par mdzad
157a5(mdo sde): cing thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnam
157a6(mdo sde): kyi yid kyi las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des/ sems can rnams bya ba dang mi bya ba dag rnam par nges par byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thug
157a7(mdo sde): kyi sprul pa'i 'phrin las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa brgya khri bzhi stong dag rnam par nges par mdzad cing
157b1(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnam bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi
157b2(mdo sde): las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba des sems can rnams bsams nas las kun nas slong ba mngon par 'du byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs
157b3(mdo sde): sprul pa'i 'phrin las mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi spyod pa de dang de dag kun tu spyod pa dang / kun tu spyod pa'i yon tan dang
157b4(mdo sde): nyes pa dag yang dag par dpyad nas de dor ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir/ gnyen po rnams mngon par 'du mdzad cing / thabs mkhas pa des kyang / sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par
157b5(mdo sde): mdzad yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams las kun
157b6(mdo sde): nas slong bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i gnyen
157b7(mdo sde): po'i chos bstan pa'i phyir/ ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs rnams la dga' bar mdzad cing / thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud/
158a1(mdo sde): par da/ sa su smon padus dang / rnam par rnal bar mdad / 'di / mdun sems sa rnams kyis dkyilas nyams sa sung bar 'gyur ba dang sams /
158a2(mdo sde): rnams bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor nyams su myong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las nyams su btang bar 'gyur ba ras kya
158a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dri ba lung bstan pa mgo gcig pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dri ba dang / bzhag pa dag ci rigs par dros pa lung bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byung ba dang 'byung
158a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang de ltar gyi don rnams nyams su btar bar mdzad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
158a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na/ 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kho na'i lags/
158a6(mdo sde): sam 'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang lags/ bka' stsal ba/ shin tu 'dus pa 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa ni/ byang chub
158a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi yang yin par blta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
158b1(mdo sde): la sa/ chus mas pa ma sas bzod pa rnams kyi mal rna da sa smra
158b2(mdo sde): dang gan du grums pa yin pas rnams mam pa car / dngag du yan ma bdas dang na du du shes pa yang myi nga/ rdzus pa yang zhus
158b3(mdo sde): bur gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
158b4(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba'i dpe mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa dpe mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
158b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji srid du 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs par ma 'gyur ba de srid du de dag la// lha'i longs spyod/
158b6(mdo sde): dngos po dang / nyams su myong ba dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo nas kyang 'dres pa lte bar 'dres pa rnams kun tu mi gnas kyi/ nam 'dres pa'i tshul du zhugs par 'gyur ba de na 'dus
158b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshal gyi mthu 'di 'dra ste/ gang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha der zhugs pa rnams la lha'i longs spyod dngos po dang / nyams su myong ba dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo nas kyang /
159a1(mdo sde): 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa rnams kun du gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mgyur pa ming du sems ma rnam pa da/
159a2(mdo sde): ma thob par de dag la btang snyoms nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang med pa gang dag yin pa yang thob par mi 'gyur la/ gnyis su 'du shes pa de dag la 'dres pa lta bar 'dres pa/
159a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa yang kun tu mi gnas so// nam mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de na gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa nyid
159a4(mdo sde): thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i btang snyoms kyang thob cing de dag la 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad
159a5(mdo sde): pa yang kun tu gnas so// shin tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ dper na chu bo dang / chu bran rnam pa mang po dag ni/ ji srid du rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas tha dad pa dang / chu tha dad pa/
159a6(mdo sde): dang na chu chung ba dang / chu skye 'grib yod pa dang / so sor rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang / srog chags chu skyes chung ngu dag gi 'tsho ba 'i bar rton pa'i gnas yin no// nam rgya mtsho chen
159a7(mdo sde): po la non par gyur pa de na gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / chu tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / chu tshad med pa dang / chu skye 'grib med pa dang / bya ba gcig sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang / srog chags chu
159b1(mdo sde): byas pal pa 'chan pa rnams kyi 'jamag par dam pa'i gnas yin no// nga bzhin du byang chub mams dpa' rnams pa mad dung ban bshags papa rgyas kyi dngas rnam par drug pa'i mu nanapas
159b2(mdo sde): zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ gnas tha dad pa dang / ye shes tha dad pa dang / ye shes chung ba dang / ye shes 'phel 'grib yod pa dang / so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang/
159b3(mdo sde): gdul ba'i sems can nyung ngu dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas ma yin no// nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de nyid na
159b4(mdo sde): gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / ye shes 'phel 'grib med pa dang / 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i
159b5(mdo sde): las can gyi ye shes dang / gdul ba'i sems can 'phel po che dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bca
159b6(mdo sde): 'di dag gsungs so// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// sgrib gnyis ldan dag mtshan nyid can// dngos po shes pa de dmigs pa// dbang zad mi shes mtshan nyid tsam// de bzhin nyid shes
159b7(mdo sde): thams cad nas// bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa can// sems can kun gyi gnyis skyed pa// gtan du mi zad 'bras bu can// sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul pa// sbyor ba'i thabs kyi 'brim ma
160a1(mdo sde): ng+gA du gardza rnams / dpag tu med pag sa dang / rang ban chos rnams pas rgyu dang / sgra las du grubs/ nas
160a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag 'di ni yang dag brjod// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu'i chen po shin tu 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems da'
160a3(mdo sde): de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/
160a4(mdo sde): pal mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / sngon rgya las 'gyur ba rnying pa brda ma bcos pa'o//
160a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du a b+hi ni skra ma na sU tra/ bod skad du/ mngon par byung ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig nyid
160a6(mdo sde): dbu ni rin chen 'od ldan dang // btsun mo pad+ma kha bye ma snyid mdangs ldan mas// slong ba dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing // chos rnams ston mdzad zhi ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang ji
160a7(mdo sde): snyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur cing // srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhi 'gyur la// sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i// zam pa gcig pu bde gshes/
160b1(mdo sde): tshams kyas 'tsham la// yangs yon tan dus byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas// mchod pa chung b.rad byas kyang rgya ma 'di 'gyur ba// ba bar gshegs pas rang bsngags gang dag sa g+sa nA sa
160b2(mdo sde): rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo// thub gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa mi skyed pa 'am// phanA pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la// tshig btu ba dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang
160b3(mdo sde): rnam bral ba// rnam par g.yongs phyir 'bras stsol 'di bdag nyung zad cing // 'di ltar pad+ma kha bye'i dbus gnas bung ba ni// 'khor zhing pad+ma las ni cung zad pa sogs par byed// de bzhin thub pa'i zhal
160b4(mdo sde): gyi pad+ma'i tshal nang nas// rang yid rab tu dga' byed cung zad bsdu bar bya// thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba// dad ldan mi la nyin par rgyas par nye 'gro ste// rnam par dpyad na tshigs
160b5(mdo sde): bcad byed mtha' mi dpogs na// rin chen mdo rgyas bsdu ba 'di ni smos ci dgos// phyogs sgo rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab// rab gsal zhes byas yi bdag por gyur pa na// bsod nam
160b6(mdo sde): stobs kyi dgra las rgyal brgyal phran gyis// btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhabs gtsang byas// glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrog 'dod chag kyis chags// 'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skyabs
160b7(mdo sde): gyur la// gzigs nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nye bar zhi bzhed pas// thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab// de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
161a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams// nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag spel// 'grol pan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag mdzad// thugs rje cher ldan
161a2(mdo sde): drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du// nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad mi skyo ji skad de// brjod par 'di ni shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang // ngag dag phyir ni cung zad yongs su brjod par bya// stag mo/
161a3(mdo sde): bi glang po spre'u dka' thub dbang // tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas// don kun bsgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po che gcig thogs// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas su skye ba
161a4(mdo sde): bzhes// der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas// skyabs med g.yo zhing phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la/ thugs rje chen pos thugs ni spro ba bskyed gyur te// gzhan gyi don
161a5(mdo sde): mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs rgyur// de bas 'di ni mi yul nye bar rab gshegs te// skye dang rga shi na pa'i 'jigs pa gzigs nas ni// rang byung blo gros des mdzad byang chub yang
161a6(mdo sde): dag brnyes// de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams
161a7(mdo sde): dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas/ byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa// nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pa shin tu chod pa rnams/
161b1(mdo sde): la thugs rjes yongs su bskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa de thugs la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por yongs su
161b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba na/ rang gi sha dang khrag dang / mgo dang mig dang bu dang chung ma rnams gtong ba dang shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims la garma
161b3(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang / rtag tu lhod pa med pa'i spo ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba las chags
161b4(mdo sde): pa dang / yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang ldan pas// gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la
161b5(mdo sde): gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog chags rnams la mchog tu snying rje bskyed nasabyams pa'i stobs dang zla 'od dang shi bi dang / glang po dang / thams cad sgrol dang / bzod par
161b6(mdo sde): smra ba dang / spre'u'i bdag po dang mi bzangs dang sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed du smon lam byas shing bsags pa// e ma'o kye ma bdag gis
161b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa yongs su 'dren pa med pa chos ma yin pa/ 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro ba/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/ sems la mi bzad pa'i//
162a1(mdo sde): chags pas zil gyis non pa khro ba mang ba/ lha ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing rnam par brlag pa phrag dog dang / ser snas kun tu bcings pa/ legs par spyod pa la 'jug/
162a2(mdo sde): pa rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la/ bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o// ma grol ba rnams ni bgrol bar
162a3(mdo sde): bya'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni// yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin na//
162a4(mdo sde): da ni don de bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na/ gdul bar nus so gdul bar nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgos nas/ 'jig
162a5(mdo sde): rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/ su ni 'grib/ su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam thag par gyur/ su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur
162a6(mdo sde): gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dbugs dbyung bar bya/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la 'bab// su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngas ngan song wa
162a7(mdo sde): kha ton te/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam na bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang
162b1(mdo sde): byug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya// gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol
162b2(mdo sde): bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa bskyed par 'os pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa yongs
162b3(mdo sde): su smin par nus pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang / la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol po dang / la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / b+hir
162b4(mdo sde): mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par gzhol ba dang / la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / la la ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams
162b5(mdo sde): nye bar bsngags pas rkyen la rag las pa gang zhig mthos pas/ dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyams par gyur pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o bdag gi yun
162b6(mdo sde): ring po nas yang dag par rtog pa rdzogs par gyur cing / nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes shing ngas bya ba ni byas so// des khur bkur ba dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/ gang dgi
162b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yun ring por mi thogs par pad+ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma rig pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur
163a1(mdo sde): gyur gyisaphyi bshol mi bya'o// 'dir gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na/ gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag
163a2(mdo sde): mi'i 'jig rten du song la/ der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang / de bzhin gang sheg pa zhin me pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/ 'di rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
163a3(mdo sde): bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sdug
163a4(mdo sde): bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba/ skyabs med pa yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog chags rnams/ dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o// thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su 'brel
163a5(mdo sde): ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mas kun tu gdungs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes
163a6(mdo sde): de lta bu'i thugs la dgongs pa brtse ba bskyed nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'jug par mdzad pa na/ rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang bu med de/ gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par
163a7(mdo sde): mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na snyam du dgongs te / byang chub
163b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bzhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur ka res 'ga' ni
163b2(mdo sde): rgyal rigs te/ da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gni 'dis kha zer bar
163b3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur bas bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /
163b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
163b5(mdo sde): rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs pa mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sem dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams
163b6(mdo sde): sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa
163b7(mdo sde): gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar yin par gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba
164a1(mdo sde): dang 'bras dang / ba glang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa dang / slong mo ba brgya 'du ba mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skyeg/
164a2(mdo sde): gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes
164a3(mdo sde): gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i
164a4(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par
164a5(mdo sde): mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te byang chub
164a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta ba zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na/ brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor mi len la/ mi rnams
164a7(mdo sde): kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad
164b1(mdo sde): can mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bsabaden pa rnams kyi snod/
164b2(mdo sde): du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i sdigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lba pa
164b3(mdo sde): snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer
164b4(mdo sde): babar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus na smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad
164b5(mdo sde): pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na
164b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun
164b7(mdo sde): par bkur zhing ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te shAkya rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos
165a1(mdo sde): bkur ba nas bzung ste/ spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha
165a2(mdo sde): zer bar mi 'gyur bar/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
165a3(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs pa mdzad do// byang chub
165a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud
165a5(mdo sde): med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rigs 'phel bar/
165a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ khro bag can ma yin pa/ phra ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs
165a7(mdo sde): mtho ba de nye du'i rigs dang ldan pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa/ khengs pa med pa/
165b1(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bu med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ e ma
165b2(mdo sde): bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin pa la gzigs so//
165b3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pa mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang
165b4(mdo sde): tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems
165b5(mdo sde): dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam
165b6(mdo sde): btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar
165b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems
166a1(mdo sde): dpas bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams
166a2(mdo sde): la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig nga 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal
166a3(mdo sde): cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug po 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod dang / sA ke ta dang / yangs pa can dang / tsam pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / wA ra NA sir nying mtshams sbyor ba
166a4(mdo sde): long shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig
166a5(mdo sde): de ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu'i ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can 'dzam bu'i gling ni rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis
166a6(mdo sde): dkrugs pa lags so// de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang
166a7(mdo sde): mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnam rdeg dang
166b1(mdo sde): bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze bad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar thob// sdom par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lkug spyod dang
166b2(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong nyon mongs med dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i
166b3(mdo sde): slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing / bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs
166b4(mdo sde): pas chos bshad do// chos de bdag cag gis thos nas/ ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems
166b5(mdo sde): lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// grogs po dag/ de'i phyir rol mo'i tshe spyad thams cad brdungs shis
166b6(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi ris kyis lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/ grogs po dag 'di la lhag par sgra gang che ga bcom
166b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la/ rtog ge ba drug
167a1(mdo sde): dang rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par byas te/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// mi rtag pa'i dung bu//
167a2(mdo sde): par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs
167a3(mdo sde): ni du ma 'joms// rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms// nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel// grogs po dag khyed cag
167a4(mdo sde): las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de/ yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te
167a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len pa bzhed kyis/ ma la de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam
167a6(mdo sde): nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga'
167a7(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa/ rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang rgyud dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan
167b1(mdo sde): daSh+Ta u sa sa rnas pa gnas sgyum sas rdzus// gang gi na kyabyang chub sems dpa' dag rnam rna / rgyus zugs pa dag /
167b2(mdo sde): ba 'di shin su g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag skrag tu gyur pa/ gang du ni ma
167b3(mdo sde): zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyi snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang / de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag rang gi lag pa brgyad
167b4(mdo sde): ba yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des gcig gis gcig mthong nas ye shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes
167b5(mdo sde): bar shes so// ji ltar sprin ni rgya chen legs 'dus pa// chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar// de bzhin blo ldan de ni lhums 'jug pa// ston ka'i sprin rung zla rgyas ji bzhin no// gang
167b6(mdo sde): tshe rtsal ldan mnyam med nyir gshegs la// de tshe 'jig rten sa sa'i gling bar na/ mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs kun shin tu ni// gsal snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos 'di //
167b7(mdo sde): gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sku 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhin mthong /
168a1(mdo sde): glang po che'i phrug gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo krung gis 'chag pa dang / seng ge'i gdan la 'dug nas
168a2(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang / mtshan mkhan rnams la
168a3(mdo sde): rmi lam 'di ji ltar ston pa yin zhes dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/ gang btsun mos rmi lam du mthong ba'i glang po che'i phrug gu dkar po zhig bdag gi ru ma g.ya/
168a4(mdo sde): pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras bltam par 'gyur ro// steng gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i
168a5(mdo sde): gdan la 'dug ste/ chos ston to zhes bya ba ni/ de yang seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed/
168a6(mdo sde): do zhes bya ba ni/ gal te rab tu byung bar gyur na/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub
168a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur
168b1(mdo sde): bar lnga'i bu ba ni yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang lag na ma dung dang lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mnga' bo cha'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha mchog gzhi la brgya/
168b2(mdo sde): byin gyis smras pa// khyed rnams song la lha mi rnams kyi ni// shin tu mchog gyur yum de ji ltar su la'ang // gnod mi byed par gus pas yongs su srungs// de rnams shin tu 'bad byas
168b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang // brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas su// rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag na thogs// byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni srung bar byed// g.yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis sbas pa
168b4(mdo sde): dang tade ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'chang zhing // lha mo rang khyim nang gnas rnam rol pa// dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pa lta bur spyod// de nas du gzhan zhin na// btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i
168b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o lha btson thams cad thar par bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas/ btson thams cad thar par byas so// de nas
168b6(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnam
168b7(mdo sde): la sbyin pa byin/ bsod rnams dag byas pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo
169a1(mdo sde): pa rnams la sbyin pa byin bsod nams ni bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i tshigs mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang long ba dang /
169a2(mdo sde): bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo ba rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin// bsod nams ni byas pa dang / de bzhin du
169a3(mdo sde): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang bkren pa dang sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams gang mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar/
169a4(mdo sde): bsnyungs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/
169a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sngags so// dper na nor bu rin po
169a6(mdo sde): che ka shi'i ras mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa
