254b6(mdo sde): dri med dang ba glang bdag dang lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
254b7(mdo sde): byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma 'i ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso
255a1(mdo sde): bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / ba ni pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs
255a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re shig shin tu gzhon pa shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
255a3(mdo sde): byung gis ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ ded pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo snyam mo// de nas grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams
255a4(mdo sde): kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag wA ra NA sir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu
255a5(mdo sde): 'khod nas grong mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen
255a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rangab /
255a7(mdo sde): tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gan so//
255b1(mdo sde): gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnams par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan parda/
255b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra tsom pa drug cu dang // drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags
255b3(mdo sde): na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang sgra dang /
255b4(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnam
255b5(mdo sde): la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la/ khyed gnyis shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig/ nga yang lteng rgyas grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de nas bdud sdig to can 'a/
255b6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gauru ta ma 'di wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su 'dug nas/ de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston te/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba
255b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / zhes bya ba nas/
256a1(mdo sde): rgyu ning dang shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i/
256a2(mdo sde): phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshig su bcad
256a3(mdo sde): pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na// ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems// bdag gis dge sbyom grol bas// 'ching ba chen pos bcing ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/
256a4(mdo sde): e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' sprul pa/ nga ni lU dang mi rnams kyis// 'ching ba gang yin kun
256a5(mdo sde): las grol// bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par// sdig can de ltar shes par gyis// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas
256a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la bcag nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi
256a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis dge slong dag skye bo mang po la
256b1(mdo sde): phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing reng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// nga yang lteng rgyas kyis grong khyer gyi sde can gang na ba der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnam/
256b2(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyis grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu
256b3(mdo sde): zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong khyer sde can du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ral pa can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byin
256b4(mdo sde): nas shing zhig gi drung du bsten te/ nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so// de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyis phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse
256b5(mdo sde): bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi
256b6(mdo sde): nags tshang tshing gang na ba 'dong ba dang / drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba zhi ba
256b7(mdo sde): ngang dul dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags
257a1(mdo sde): gnas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cig bud med cig gzigs sam/ gnon nu ga dung med de khyed cag gi cir 'od/ btsun pa 'di na
257a2(mdo sde): bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyis slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag
257a3(mdo sde): rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bor nas bdag cag tshol lags so// gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems/ bud med tshol ba
257a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang yin pa gang bdam/ btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyid/ bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags de 'dam lags so// gzhon nu dag de'i
257a5(mdo sde): phyir 'dug shig dang / khyed la chos bshad do// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
257a6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par snyan pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis
257a7(mdo sde): stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis
257b1(mdo sde): chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang // chos rig pa dang / chos kyis gting slebs pa dang / som ti las rgal pa dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi/
257b2(mdo sde): bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jig pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
257b3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags
257b4(mdo sde): kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs
257b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar nas
257b6(mdo sde): dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas/ snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs
257b7(mdo sde): so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thob mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las
258a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dgo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug
258a2(mdo sde): bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dis mar sar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar dang ra bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo
258a3(mdo sde): dang dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so// grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang
258a4(mdo sde): gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas/
258a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas grong po'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
258a6(mdo sde): go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par snyan ces bya ba nas mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i
258a7(mdo sde): bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyis mdzad pa mdzod du gsol/ bcom
258b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bar gnang // de nas thong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar
258b2(mdo sde): rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bcug par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gcang zhing bsod pas
258b3(mdo sde): 8/ brgya ba da nga la gnas babs shid rkyen par byas so// btsam ldan 'das kyis ga sa bcams yang rgyung yang dUr bar ma
258b4(mdo sde): rnam te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chom mnyan pa'i gyur 'a'ad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thong ba'i bum dga' ma dang dpa'i stobs ma la rgyam dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis snang /
258b5(mdo sde): gakhar bsgru/ sang das par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzengs bsod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdun las pa zhes te shegs so/ denas bcom
258b6(mdo sde): sa grang kyi rgyas pa shegs pan 'disam du gangs sa sras pa gang+gA dang rgyas bzang bar bkur sa ga kyang pas rnam pa gang nag yang du byas yang du
258b7(mdo sde): tshigs chung ngus skye po'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod sam mo// nga'i tshe steng rgyas 'ang srungs ral pa can bcas nas lo brgya bu lon pa nas 'khogs gtugs pa sa yang /
259a1(mdo sde): pa re ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang ne rak+Sha na'i tshwa klung
259a2(mdo sde): gis 'gram gyis bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga
259a3(mdo sde): d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can dbang du byas te 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshi gra/
259a4(mdo sde): chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyus 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs so// ljang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das
259a5(mdo sde): rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/ dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so//
259a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po yun ring mo zhig lag na gang nas 'khor te 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la/
259a7(mdo sde): bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas bod srungs ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtas rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas
259b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs gal te khyed la mi bde ba med
259b2(mdo sde): na khyod kyis me khang du nga zhag cig gcig bdug go// dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod mtho btsam par 'gyur du mchi'o// 'od srungs re/
259b3(mdo sde): shog gnang bar gyis shig dang / mtho tsam par mi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho mi tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde 'khor nar bzhugs zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng
259b4(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis mkhang gang na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang po
259b5(mdo sde): bsrang ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyog par bzhag ste gzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa phyung ngo //
259b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus dud pa phyung ngo // klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de
259b7(mdo sde): nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa sreg par byed do// de nas
260a1(mdo sde): klu lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na ma khang thams cad 'bar kun tu 'bar kun tu rab tus ten lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo //
260a2(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma 'di ltar mdzad pa/ klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grangakyi hud nyon mong pa bdag gi tshig ma mnyan no snyam mo// de nas bcom
260a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chad pa bcad kyis/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu
260a4(mdo sde): gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed cing dul bar byas na lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo//
260a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa
260a6(mdo sde): lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/ da dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyus 'od srungs gang ni ba der bsnams te gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom
260a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig 'od srungs gson no// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis
260b1(mdo sde): lhung bzed na bsnams 'byon pa ci/ 'od srungs klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas brdul nas lhung bzed du gtsug na/
260b2(mdo sde): kyor te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
260b3(mdo sde): ba yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas kyis nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis
260b4(mdo sde): bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i ma thab gsum gsum ste me thab stong lnga brgya yod do// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par
260b5(mdo sde): 'dod na me sbar bar ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan
260b6(mdo sde): po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs de spang bar rngo ma thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
260b7(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la
261a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig 'dir bdag gi bram ze khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de sbyar bar rngo ma thog nas/
261a2(mdo sde): bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol/
261a3(mdo sde): de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
261a4(mdo sde): ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas/ me bsad par
261a5(mdo sde): 'dod na/ bsad par ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od gsungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan
261a6(mdo sde): po mkhyen par mdzod cig dang 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs 'gum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
261a7(mdo sde): srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdage sbyong chen po// bdag gi ni 'khor na gnas ni de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang
261b1(mdo sde): na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhug/
261b2(mdo sde): sum par 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdog gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me de bsad dam/
261b3(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis mthu dang // lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus me rang nyid shi'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can
261b4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na
261b5(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang nyid ma la yongs su spyod par 'dod na sbar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba'i bar du nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de/
261b6(mdo sde): bzhin du yongs su spyad nas bsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can
261b7(mdo sde): gyis me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan
262a1(mdo sde): yang skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad par ma nus so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong
262a2(mdo sde): chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/
262a3(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po 'di rab dag gis me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid
262a4(mdo sde): pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims nas zhugs 'gum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag go nye 'khor na/ dge sbyong
262a5(mdo sde): chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me de zhi bar bya 'am/ dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi song
262a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing
262a7(mdo sde): mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs
262b1(mdo sde): so// dri nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas kwa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas/
262b2(mdo sde): tede rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bur/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lcag gcig tu gyur nas bsreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te dag
262b3(mdo sde): sbyong chen po yang med la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de de'i spyan snga na kau me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'barakun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa yod do snyam mo//
262b4(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral po can nang par sngar langs te// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der so ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad
262b5(mdo sde): du gsol/ 'dir bdag ma dang gsum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngun zhugs kyis phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu
262b6(mdo sde): gyur te bsreg pa bgyid pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ de ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar
262b7(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas bsreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo// 'od srungs cing me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga mo la yongasu mi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nu
263a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs las// sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyis// me 'am yang na chu dag la// yongs rten yon tan ci zhig yod// de lce mod kyis 'dir mdang gsum rgyal po
263a2(mdo sde): chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ ngagang na ba der 'ong te lhag nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'ab
263a3(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed par bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'gu pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te
263a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyis ngag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lha rnams dag gi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas
263a5(mdo sde): mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun
263a6(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po dag pas kyang ches lhag cing 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de
263a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mo
263b1(mdo sde): kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas mi mjed kyis bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das
263b2(mdo sde): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung po chen po lnga po/
263b3(mdo sde): de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral
263b4(mdo sde): pa can de nyid kyis mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan
263b5(mdo sde): che mod kyis bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de'i tshe ldeng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po//
263b6(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de nyid la bya ba byed
263b7(mdo sde): par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom zhungs kyi thugs kyis
264a1(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la rnyed pa dang
264a2(mdo sde): bkur sti chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang ldan skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
264a3(mdo sde): can gyis 'dug gnas na mchog sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems de zhag bdun po 'di la bdag rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang
264a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'od kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das
264a5(mdo sde): kyi thugs kyi ltong rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring
264a6(mdo sde): po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas
264a7(mdo sde): gzhan du bzhud pa lags/ 'od srungs khyod kyi bdug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas/ 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu
264b1(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyis bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun 'di nas ba/
264b2(mdo sde): du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas/ zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srungs 'o/
264b3(mdo sde): kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan// skye bo'i cho ga
264b4(mdo sde): chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod dugazhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam dge sbyong chen
264b5(mdo sde): po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas de 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad du gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral po can 'di/
264b6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mo dkyis kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas bod srungs ral pa can gyis
264b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po de'i srad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis khyed la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro// bcom ldan
265a1(mdo sde): 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas/
265a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom 'angs la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdug tshod lags shing mchis nas/ dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
265a3(mdo sde): 'od srungs de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag nas shing 'jame bu
265a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdag pa de las kha dog dang dri zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i ske ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ ljang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can
265a5(mdo sde): gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu ltung rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'dra/
265a6(mdo sde): nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon
265a7(mdo sde): tam 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge slong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thug mnyam par gzhog na/ shing
265b1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gi 'dzam bu'i gling du btags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snga ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/
265b2(mdo sde): zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul tshani
265b3(mdo sde): mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang gra som pa yin no snyam mo// shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gi/ 'dzam bu gling du btag pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil ba'i nags dang /
265b4(mdo sde): ka pid tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs
265b5(mdo sde): ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
265b6(mdo sde): can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge
265b7(mdo sde): sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyis gling du gshegs na//
266a1(mdo sde): ma smos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lus sbyang bzed bgang nas/ 'dir byin pa du lta bu tid nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na yodas stong cig/ dge sbyong /
266a2(mdo sde): chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che ming/
266a3(mdo sde): kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyis
266a4(mdo sde): bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom
266a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste/ chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das chus chu'i/
266a6(mdo sde): bye ba mdzad do// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chags na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni mang na
266a7(mdo sde): chu 'di da ltar gang nas 'bab snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge
266b1(mdo sde): ma ma sa r+b+hu sa A sa sa yong // gas
266b2(mdo sde): man smrar chu ga sa cwags byud / da dru 'a pa mang rnams bags nas/ sa 'a rgyu rgyas kyis kyi bas du ga
266b3(mdo sde): chu'i dgos pa c-ig byung ngo // de nas ma rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ dgangan ba der 'od kyi phyin nas nga'i bdun nas lag pas sa la bstan gyi
266b4(mdo sde): las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srungs rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs rol pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
266b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan tshe mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'phred nang du yang dag 'jog las
266b6(mdo sde): banang nas/ rdzing bu lag pas brkos pa grang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas/
266b7(mdo sde): brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo // de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa/
267a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag
267a2(mdo sde): brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dir
267a3(mdo sde): su zhig gis btud snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song skya byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen
267a4(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa ni rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po bdud pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ ar+tha
267a5(mdo sde): na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na su zhig gi btud snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dir phyed 'phred na nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzheng nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang
267a6(mdo sde): na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gro rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag
267a7(mdo sde): pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas/ shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di rung par gyur to// de la ngas 'jus nas
267b1(mdo sde): rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // bod srungs 'di ni ardzun lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po/
267b2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom
267b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas
267b4(mdo sde): ri brag gcig las rdo leb che ba ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag dang /
267b5(mdo sde): khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/
267b6(mdo sde): nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las/
267b7(mdo sde): rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i
268a1(mdo sde): na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo// lteng rgyal 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas
268a2(mdo sde): na 'chab pa na rdolab che ba'i sa ga mjed do/ tho nas pa ni nas du sa m+ba te/ rdolal ches ba 'di dag sngon ni mngan rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gi khyer te 'od snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
268a3(mdo sde): can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bste gnas na 'a#
268a4(mdo sde): panA/ rdo leb che la ring bu dag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdol pa tshul ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na rdol ba che la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis
268a5(mdo sde): 'tshal te mchis nyam bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so// de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ra sa ngag gang du bkru
268a6(mdo sde): snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ong te phyin nas/ nga la 'di/
268a7(mdo sde): skang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgod/
268b1(mdo sde): tengs phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la
268b2(mdo sde): ring ba zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la
268b3(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod pa'i sha ni'i ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srungs rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du
268b4(mdo sde): sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ yu tshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas
268b5(mdo sde): 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bo ste gnas kyi nags tshangs tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe na rany+dza na'i chu cher brug nas bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i
268b6(mdo sde): steng na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po
268b7(mdo sde): drug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsam nas/ shing cig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od
269a1(mdo sde): srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i ljang na/ sa rdul gyi yog pa bla gab med pan 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo // mthong \u0f7f
269a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srungs gson no// dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srungs 'jug go/
269a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thug mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dra/
269a4(mdo sde): bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar tshu la 'jug de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
269a5(mdo sde): srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
269a6(mdo sde): kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen pas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/
269a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems
269b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdug legs par gsungs
269b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / sten par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar dag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs khyod kyi
269b3(mdo sde): 'khyod la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srungs de'i phyir re shig 'khor lo ltos shig/ 'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa bshes gnyen can rnams
269b4(mdo sde): kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag
269b5(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de tham
269b6(mdo sde): cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs por spyod pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo //
269b7(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung ne rany+dza na'o 'gram du bor shig/ mkhan po
270a1(mdo sde): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khre'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u blugs dang / brug gzar rnams chu klung /
270a2(mdo sde): nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa tsan ga na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smos so// mkhan po 'dir bdag 'di ltar bdag/
270a3(mdo sde): cag gi bdag gis bgyi ba gang lags de bgyis lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan
270a4(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag gi 'khor la bltas lags te/ bdag legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa
270a5(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bod srungs tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / de nyid kyi tshe dang ldan pa/
270a6(mdo sde): de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / ngos dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis spun chu klung 'od srungs dang 'od srungs gnyis//
270a7(mdo sde): 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung nai rat+na na'i 'jug gi 'gram gyis bsti nas na dka' thub spyod do// chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga yaM 'od srungs spun gnyis kyi g.yang gzhi dang
270b1(mdo sde): shing shun dang / khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u blugs dang / drug gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshud
270b2(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams/ rgyal po 'am chom rkun nam me 'am chus nyes dmig 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag cag gis tshang ba mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo//
270b3(mdo sde): de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bstig nas gang na ba der song ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
270b4(mdo sde): pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can skra phyi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga la 'ong
270b5(mdo sde): srungs gis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa cin sgo phyi snam sbyar bgos nasabacom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyen pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
270b6(mdo sde): 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// 'od srungs 'di mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srungs dag 'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang /
270b7(mdo sde): ga ya 'od srungs spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
271a1(mdo sde): can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khog gtug pa ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byasabla mar byas/ rjed par byas mchod pa byas shing da
271a2(mdo sde): bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam
271a3(mdo sde): du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po//
271a4(mdo sde): thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srungs dag de'i phyir re shig
271a5(mdo sde): 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyed lta bu'i mi grag pa dang ldan po/ bo shes gnyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / g.ya 'od srungs spun rang gi/
271a6(mdo sde): bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad
271a7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spun sngar
271b1(mdo sde): par spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'ong /
271b2(mdo sde): srungs spun 'khor nyis bcwa lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis du ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor
271b3(mdo sde): la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsung po'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob po lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen
271b4(mdo sde): po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs dag tshur shog/ tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /
271b5(mdo sde): des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral ba can stong po de dag rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ ltung rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar
271b6(mdo sde): du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yar byon nas ga ya 'i mgor mchod na la sngon gyisangs pa can tham ca sa nga di blo slong dang thab cig tu bzhugs so//
271b7(mdo sde): nges nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam po gsum gyis 'ong par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod kyi cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bsta/
272a1(mdo sde): tsho bulalo// babacom ldand mi rdzu phu gyis cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ji ltar thugs mnyam par gnag na nyid kyi gdan gyis nang du mi snang bar/
272a2(mdo sde): gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la sngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad
272a3(mdo sde): dodame'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag
272a4(mdo sde): 'byin par mdzad do// 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston pa mdzad de
272a5(mdo sde): sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'beb par mdzad do// sku'i stong nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad
272a6(mdo sde): po de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul
272a7(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'dra
272b1(mdo sde): kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam
272b2(mdo sde): par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni gartogs shig ge 'di ni ma gtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shigaka 'di ni ma spang shig/ 'di ni lus
272b3(mdo sde): kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te gnos shigs smra ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
272b4(mdo sde): ni 'di yin te/ dge slong 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang mig gis rnam par
272b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug
272b6(mdo sde): bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang yid kyis rnam
272b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma
273a1(mdo sde): yin pa sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang gti mug gi/
273a2(mdo sde): me kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu
273a3(mdo sde): 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyis rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon thams cad ral chen du gyur pa'i dge slong
273a4(mdo sde): de len pa med par zad pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang
273a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems
273a6(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu gang ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan
273a7(mdo sde): shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser rgya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze'i mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor
273b1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ros dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba// rin po che sna 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur /
273b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yin/
273b3(mdo sde): no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' brtul pod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi rje rab tu 'joms pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus
273b4(mdo sde): parateganod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas leg par phab sre gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha
273b5(mdo sde): spu khregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du
273b6(mdo sde): sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs
273b7(mdo sde): can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsolabadag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon du gang ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
274a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sung jig rten dum rnam par grags par 'gyu bar yang bstan pa zheg zas sa zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// zhwa rnam na/
274a2(mdo sde): lta bas matso bobam ros gtso la 'gyur na mchi 'o// rjod pa dag gas rnams kyis gzhon du grangs 'i ngos zhes bya ba nas grag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ mu de khrum shis
274a3(mdo sde): khribs gtso bo bas ches gso bar 'gyul du mchi'on pa khyed cagang ma ma spa shig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag shArgya rnams kyis gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba'i bar geng ma bzhin du ste/ gal
274a4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te sra dpa kha lnga bregs te gos ngur smrig 'gos nas dang pa yang dag pa kho na sa khyim nas med par rab tu byung bar gyur
274a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyu ra na// de'i nyan thos su khas zang bar bya'o// de na si ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bas
274a6(mdo sde): myargyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi la smon par byed do// kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
274a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bskur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
274b1(mdo sde): son pa bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / che bar song na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang /
274b2(mdo sde): bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslabs pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa
274b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po phreng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi la smon par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa
274b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgya
274b5(mdo sde): ba dang / shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshon mkhan dang ltas mkhan
274b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de skra dang kha spu bregs te gas ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyiman
274b7(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag/ g.ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge
275a1(mdo sde): slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pabya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su/
275a2(mdo sde): zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes zos so// zos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang ba na der song /
275a3(mdo sde): ste lhags nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di na lha yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang
275a4(mdo sde): lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas/
275a5(mdo sde): khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag ga ya na ga ya'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i
275a6(mdo sde): dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du skye lha de lta bkur
275a7(mdo sde): sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtsor 'gyur ro// de nas mab d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba kA ye nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song
275b1(mdo sde): la song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam 'tsho 'amabaskyod pa yang ngam stobs dang /
275b2(mdo sde): bde ba dang / su nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar dun
275b3(mdo sde): bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / gzoms cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs
275b4(mdo sde): pug sol zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
275b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo/
275b6(mdo sde): sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste/ snyun gsol lags so// kye mi khyod
275b7(mdo sde): dang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nasaka'adi skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong
276a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun dang thabs tshig la/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / kun dpyad kyi rten sman dang / yo byad nam/
276a2(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang mi gasrung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das
276a3(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa
276a4(mdo sde): can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+ha'i
276a5(mdo sde): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yul ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rabs gnas ltung brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/
276a6(mdo sde): ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ljang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i da
276a7(mdo sde): rmong stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas lhung zang
276b1(mdo sde): gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ mag d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ljang brang gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so zhes zos so// zos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ rgyal/
276b2(mdo sde): po'i mthu chen po dang / rgya lo'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang / shing rta brgya stong snyed dang lhan cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/
276b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to// des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la smras pa
276b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po khyed kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi/ khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag brtson ra na 'dug gis/ de dag thon cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar gdon no zhes rgyal po/
276b5(mdo sde): btson rnams 'don du bcug go// yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na/ de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go// des yang bsam pa bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des na bdag
276b6(mdo sde): la ltas ngan gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thub pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang
276b7(mdo sde): yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na/ las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig/ rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang
277a1(mdo sde): bkug go/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rtakhri nyis stong dang / zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgya stong dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim
277a2(mdo sde): bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo //
277a3(mdo sde): de ji tsam gzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ gzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar bzhugs so// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos
277a4(mdo sde): zag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang / gdugs dang / ral gri dang / nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do//
277a5(mdo sde): denas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
277a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de rang gi ming nas phyung ste/ lan gsum du gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
277a7(mdo sde): snying po lags so// btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// rgyal po lags so// rgyal po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
277b1(mdo sde): khong po sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal po yin// rgyal po chen po lda rang gi stan 'i lbub la
277b2(mdo sde): gdug shog/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag
277b3(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu
277b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po/
277b5(mdo sde): nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyus 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag
277b6(mdo sde): rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/ 'on te ldeng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa
277b7(mdo sde): la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/
278a1(mdo sde): rgyas gnas pa tsud la na/ saspangs na sa mas da stsog/ sa mas can ngas pa/ 'a thas pa ba
278a2(mdo sde): 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ 'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro// 'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na sgra/ de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste/ des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bzeg blugs min// khyod ni/
278a3(mdo sde): 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang // de bzhin rol yid ni mi dga' na// wa mi 'jig rten la gyi khyod kyi yid// dga' ba yin nam 'od srungs dri yis spros// srang po ma mchis ni ba ci ma mchis/
278a4(mdo sde): 'dod mig ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis mi bkro ga 'brang mchog mthong ste// des bdag mchod sbyin mi dgu' brtse gzugs min// go 'bang mi rnams mchog ni ma mthong bas/
278a5(mdo sde): mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis// grol sngam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te// dmus long gyur nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin mthong // skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad
278a6(mdo sde): pa go 'phang 'dus ma byas de bzod mthong na// zug pa go'u ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni// skye bo'o phal cher don brtson bden la zhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
278a7(mdo sde): khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te// khyod kyis nyes par rabasams ma yin// rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams la/ gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srungs 'khor skyo ba skyed cig//
278b1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng
278b2(mdo sde): gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam bzhi byed de snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul rnam bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus
278b3(mdo sde): tebla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
278b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so// bdag ni
278b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srungs de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srungs nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srungs nga ni
278b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srungs khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
278b7(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dpa khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po ni steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can mi tshangs par spyod
279a1(mdo sde): pa la mi spyod kyi lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can nyid ni dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
279a2(mdo sde): rgyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang
279a3(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po yang rigs kyis bus gzugs kyi skye ba
279a4(mdo sde): dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /
279a5(mdo sde): 'a'ajig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na
279a6(mdo sde): mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na/
279a7(mdo sde): bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas
279b1(mdo sde): malen/ mi 'dzin/ lag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tsha med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// zhes smras so// rgyal po rin po rigs kyi buH
279b2(mdo sde): nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par byed na tshad
279b3(mdo sde): med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin tshor ba dang /
279b4(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ 'o na bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba po 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sa
279b5(mdo sde): shed bu 'am/ byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ kun nas shes pa po 'am/ slong ba po 'am/ kun nas slong ba po 'am/ smra ba po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/
279b6(mdo sde): kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pa gang gis de dang der dge ba dang / sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so
279b7(mdo sde): sor nyams su myong zhing / gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i
280a1(mdo sde): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang
280a2(mdo sde): mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing / 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'di 'gag go// skye ba
280a3(mdo sde): na'adu byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa ni 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas/
280a4(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi pho dang / skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas
280a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag ngas de/
280a6(mdo sde): ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/ sems can nam zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin ste/ gang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang
280a7(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin pas yang gi dang der sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong zhing / gang gis phung po 'do bor te phung po gzhan dang cing mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar brtag pa /
280b1(mdo sde): yin no zhes mi gsung ngo // de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rigs pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed// 'du byed kyi
280b2(mdo sde): rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen
280b3(mdo sde): gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
280b4(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med pas 'di med la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di
280b5(mdo sde): 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas/ 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/
280b6(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag
280b7(mdo sde): sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
281a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gug par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed/
281a2(mdo sde): rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag su/ rgyu bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying
281a3(mdo sde): mtsham sa sbyor ba med pas/ 'gag pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin//
281a4(mdo sde): pade ni nye bar zhi ba/ de ni sil bar gyur pa de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta su/ phung po thams cad spangs pa sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral
281a5(mdo sde): ba 'gag pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du
281a6(mdo sde): sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so//
281a7(mdo sde): mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'byung ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos zos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go nas bdag tu
281b1(mdo sde): khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di/
281b2(mdo sde): ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos
281b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos zos pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa
281b4(mdo sde): ma lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am
281b5(mdo sde): ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag zag ring ba 'am/ gang dag zag nye bar yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi/
281b6(mdo sde): bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gang ci yang rung ba
281b7(mdo sde): dang rnam par shes pa gang yi ci yang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/
282a1(mdo sde): gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag zag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung / de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag
282a2(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos zos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar
282a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur/
282a4(mdo sde): 'o// rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bsten to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam
282a5(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mim
282a6(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang chos
282a7(mdo sde): gtong slebs pa dang / som gyi las rgal ba dang the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang rton pas bstan pa'i chos na
282b1(mdo sde): la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te b+ha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
282b2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis
282b3(mdo sde): dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /
282b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims chad dang/ snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags
282b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mag/
282b6(mdo sde): d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
282b7(mdo sde): kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i khab du byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so//
283a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring por ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang / de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal
