283a2(mdo sde): dang pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs su sdud pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang yin pa de/ yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis kyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis bdud
283a3(mdo sde): rtsi sngar rnyed pa des gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgosalhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang ldog pa
283a4(mdo sde): dang cung zad blta ba dang / rnam par blta ba dang / skum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la
283a5(mdo sde): zhugs so// de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang cung zad blta ba dang / rnam par blta ba dang /
283a6(mdo sde): bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
283a7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed lhags shing gnas pa dag 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gi sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gis
283b1(mdo sde): ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste dge slong khrod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o sam du rigs nas/ lam po che rub bzhig na 'gro ba dang
283b2(mdo sde): ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas su tu rgyu rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces
283b3(mdo sde): skyes so// dge slong khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i chos kyi dge sbyong golu ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu
283b4(mdo sde): bregs nas gos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod do// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kha
283b5(mdo sde): bo'i ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no// kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo // kho bo de'i chos la dga'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni gnon pa dang rab tu byung
283b6(mdo sde): ba gsar pas/ de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par tu bstan par smra ba ma/
283b7(mdo sde): yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ltar des bstan par bya'o// dge slong kho bo la ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung bang rung sto/ ci// de nas tshe dang ldan
284a1(mdo sde): pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/
284a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos rna mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//
284a3(mdo sde): de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhon gyi dring mi
284a4(mdo sde): 'jogs pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pas/ ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la
284a5(mdo sde): bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin// bskal dbye ba khrag khrig tu/ sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i// 'chi med mya ngan
284a6(mdo sde): med pa yi// go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tsha la ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// de nas
284a7(mdo sde): kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang
284b1(mdo sde): ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas/ kun tu rgyu bang nas skyes gal ba der song ngo // kun tu rgyu bang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu ma rgyal thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo // mthong nas/
284b2(mdo sde): kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dngas/ bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ lpags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na/ khyod
284b3(mdo sde): kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig/ de nas kun tu rgyu te rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /
284b4(mdo sde): de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad du gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che// tshe dang ldan pa ra dung yang lan gcig rjod cig/ tshe dang ldan pa
284b5(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig
284b6(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal
284b7(mdo sde): ba dang the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stong bsrangs nas/
285a1(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ kun tu'i rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/
285a2(mdo sde): skal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i// 'chi med mya ngan med pa yi// go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang lda/
285a3(mdo sde): pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir je bakhor/
285a4(mdo sde): la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no// de nas kun tu rgyunya rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram
285a5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na/ khyed cag ji ltar byed
285a6(mdo sde): mkhan po gnyis bdag ma cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis la brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshad/
285a7(mdo sde): par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig/ de nas kun tu ts+tsha/
285b1(mdo sde): rgyal dang bang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs/
285b2(mdo sde): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho na nas gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis grogs po'i tshig
285b3(mdo sde): yongs su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/ tshogs kyis mdun nas 'ongs pa 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo // 'di gnyis ni nyan
285b4(mdo sde): thos zung gi mchog dang / zung bzang por gyur te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la/ cig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas dge
285b5(mdo sde): slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa smras pa/ ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa// skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon// bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pa// grogs po ni rgyal bar
285b6(mdo sde): nas skyes// 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par// de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas// tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni// 'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi/ bzung mchog 'gyur zhes ngas bstan
285b7(mdo sde): tita gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog/ cig shes shes rab ldan pa yi// mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad// danas kun du rgyu rgyas dang / pa nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das gas pa dang dos gyi/
286a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i/
286a2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
286a3(mdo sde): de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog/ ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing / dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bko' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bkri'i 'jug kho nar
286a4(mdo sde): skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs pa/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bu/
286a5(mdo sde): gnas par gyur to// yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pa// skra byi rnam sbyor gyon po'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas
286a6(mdo sde): dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs goso/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi bsod snyoms la zhugs
286a7(mdo sde): pab dang rta de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsten par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi
286b1(mdo sde): dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i
286b2(mdo sde): kun khrid nas// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya// des dge slong rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po'i ngag rgyal po'i khab tu bso/
286b3(mdo sde): snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas
286b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan
286b5(mdo sde): 'das la dge sbyong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs
286b6(mdo sde): tergyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
286b7(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas tso 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grong
287a1(mdo sde): mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya// zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams spu gong zhing mi dga' ba
287a2(mdo sde): dang mi 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to// bcom ldan 'dra kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po'i khub kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces 'di la dpa' chen bde
287a3(mdo sde): gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed// ces brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi
287a4(mdo sde): rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag sha ma thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos
287a5(mdo sde): thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab du song snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
287a6(mdo sde): nus ring po ma lon pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de drug mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyal ga d+ha dag gis
287a7(mdo sde): grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya// de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa 'di la
287b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyi khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/ mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad/
287b2(mdo sde): zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
287b3(mdo sde): tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka ra ba nA bzhugs so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras
287b4(mdo sde): kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos phro nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang gtang ba de dang de dag
287b5(mdo sde): de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par
287b6(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi
287b7(mdo sde): dgyes shing bzhugs / des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i
288a1(mdo sde): gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o// nga ni kho bos 'phrin yig skul ba'i mi gtang na 'ga' yang 'a
288a2(mdo sde): khyer te mi 'ong na/ ji ltar sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchis te/ bka' mchong 'tshal la slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char
288a3(mdo sde): ka gang dang grang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang sngon de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'char kas smras pa/
288a4(mdo sde): lha slar mchi lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ khyed ni gang gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/
288a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba ljon shing la bsdad na// da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lcug ma 'phel bar 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzha/
288a6(mdo sde): yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chus rdzun kun te/ bu gcig yul mos 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na// de la yon/
288a7(mdo sde): tan 'bras bu mi sbyar khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na// ting don bsgrub nas gnyen rnams ni// shin tu che dang phan gdag zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni/
288b1(mdo sde): shin tu tshe dang phan gdag zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni// khyod kyi zhi gnas de banang na// bdag dang gnyis kyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtse rjes su bzung mdzod de// gshegs
288b2(mdo sde): par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas cha sa te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
288b3(mdo sde): ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ spring yig lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so//
288b4(mdo sde): bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bcud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
288b5(mdo sde): 'char ka 'dong ngo // 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/ de sngon gyi 'dres pa khyo nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dam/ bdag gi mthus bkri
288b6(mdo sde): bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di la tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i
288b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi mad na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shig/ sreng 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs
289a1(mdo sde): rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yi bkri// gang zhig bcom nas btsugs pa med gyur cig/ 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min
289a2(mdo sde): ba/ sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang
289a3(mdo sde): ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags te rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang
289a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung
289a5(mdo sde): la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ yab dang yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang
289a6(mdo sde): bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig ldan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu byung /
289a7(mdo sde): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu
289b1(mdo sde): phyung shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun tu spyod pa'i
289b2(mdo sde): chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas// 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka'
289b3(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
289b4(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
289b5(mdo sde): pa 'char ka song la khyod mod kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgor sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du spyon cig zer na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs
289b6(mdo sde): nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang byon nam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhe 'drin
289b7(mdo sde): 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed/
290a1(mdo sde): dam zhes 'dri na/ mi bzhugs so brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'drin dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal
290a2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'drin/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyis rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byon no zhes brjod pa bya'o//
290a3(mdo sde): ji srid cig na byon zhes 'di na zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song shig/ sa bdag/
290a4(mdo sde): rnams ni tshig gis te// lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
290a5(mdo sde): 'char ka ji ltar sad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi
290a6(mdo sde): sbyor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag
290a7(mdo sde): yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa
290b1(mdo sde): 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/ lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyis po nya
290b2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal pa nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag cag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag
290b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis 'khyud nas/ spyan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don du chu btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa
290b4(mdo sde): 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji srid rjes su bstan pa'i chos yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la btags nas ngo mtshar skyes te/
290b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lag
290b6(mdo sde): so/ dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu mo khyer bzhin no// nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no// rgya li
290b7(mdo sde): zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang
291a1(mdo sde): brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gnon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha byon na
291a2(mdo sde): dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba// shos ldan gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang po brang byi dong
291a3(mdo sde): byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang
291a4(mdo sde): du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal pos
291a5(mdo sde): blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / dun du rbu rtsig tu chug shig// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal
291a6(mdo sde): zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rgyal gyi rnam pa gtsug lug khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtswa cig/
291a7(mdo sde): brtsig tu bcug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ dge slong rnams la bcom
291b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzem na/ khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe
291b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan/
291b3(mdo sde): 'dzom na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhib 'khor ni ba grol ba 'khor gros gzugs phyin ga/ 'asod dums byin pan+d+ha
291b4(mdo sde): par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gis
291b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bskod ba lta bu / glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu
291b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis
291b7(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyis rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu
292a1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bug yul 'khor skyong
292a2(mdo sde): dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyis tshogs kyis
292a3(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
292a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i
292a5(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pos lhags pa'i 'od
292a6(mdo sde): can te rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
292a7(mdo sde): dge slong gis dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon no zhes thos so// thos nas
292b1(mdo sde): kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gsegs ma rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshama?
292b2(mdo sde): dar gyis chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi tra ka nas gang yang n+ya go d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan
292b3(mdo sde): rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go// de na 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do// kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhin
292b4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyis dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams
292b5(mdo sde): cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyis zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la byed pa blta'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
292b6(mdo sde): tegal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi gnas su gshegs pa nas/ lkog po zhig
292b7(mdo sde): grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zha 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te/ des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis
293a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa lta zhes/ ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyams nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la
293a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug
293a3(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang
293a4(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog ngag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang stong par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod chu grang
293a5(mdo sde): mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i sdod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'beb par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs/
293a6(mdo sde): la ji lta bar/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs ba nir rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par 'du mdzad pa da
293a7(mdo sde): bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom
293b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni// dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum
293b2(mdo sde): gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge sbyong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid
293b3(mdo sde): tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gri srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni
293b4(mdo sde): dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams
293b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o//
293b6(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa
293b7(mdo sde): 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
294a1(mdo sde): lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ 'din nyon mongs sel mdzad nga nas sa pa ma mas
294a2(mdo sde): kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa las/ dri med btsal ba chos kyis dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la
294a3(mdo sde): phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas sol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun spyon zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang / 'dzam bu'i
294a4(mdo sde): grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang shakya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha
294a5(mdo sde): tshig ces ma dad pa skyed do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag dgadod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i
294a6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bsdams pa na/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos
294a7(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyis snang ba nyams su myong
294b1(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan
294b2(mdo sde): dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so//
294b3(mdo sde): gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams
294b4(mdo sde): las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po bsgrub te bzhugs pa na
294b5(mdo sde): shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab shar phyogs su bab kyang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du
294b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i chos nges/ kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas nas
294b7(mdo sde): skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/
295a1(mdo sde): zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung/
295a2(mdo sde): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// gnas
295a3(mdo sde): med khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa 'jigs dang sa rnams su// ji lta bur ni 'ba' shig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi yi
295a4(mdo sde): bdag po gang du ni// khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa/ ba so gser gyis rtsa ba can// shin
295a5(mdo sde): tu bde ba bting ba yi// khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las// bting ba la ni ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po rnams grol gnas mal ni// dga' ba byang chub la/
295a6(mdo sde): lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnams spangs mnal// rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// tsher mar
295a7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang // yang dag rtsol ba'i banon pa yis// sa \u0f7f/
295b1(mdo sde): rnam par rgyun na yang / nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i// na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las// ngur smrig rtsub po'i
295b2(mdo sde): gos mnabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes// nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te// de bgos thub pa zhi pa rnams// nags
295b3(mdo sde): khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas// du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chen gsol ba las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod
295b4(mdo sde): snyoms ni// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par byung dang mnyam par gzhag ldan pa'i/
295b5(mdo sde): nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jig rten kun la snying brtse'i phyir spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gi gsol pa// mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i// rgun skyems kha ra'i chab
295b6(mdo sde): gsol na// rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i// chab ni ji lta ba zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi'i bdag po gang 'thungs na// bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni//
295b7(mdo sde): dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa// chab kyi ro mchog nga mthung ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang // khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus
296a1(mdo sde): bzhin bzhugs// da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs// bcom 'das kyis bka' stsam pa// go'u tam
296a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa// dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas// nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te// nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med// rgyal po zas gnang gis
296a3(mdo sde): gsol pa// khyod sngon khrus lang shin tu yid 'ongs par// khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na// gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang de ltar su yis khrus/
296a4(mdo sde): mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// go'u ta ma chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mis bkrus na// lus
296a5(mdo sde): mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na// rnyog pa can la dri nga ba// chab kyis ji ltar khrus
296a6(mdo sde): mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa go'u ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med// bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ de la rig pa'i yon tan mis
296a7(mdo sde): bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi// tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing // ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa
296b1(mdo sde): las/ de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims nga yi rgyun yin te// tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ mongs skyes
296b2(mdo sde): nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod// gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye// yid byung ba yang gang las skyes// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs//
296b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga ni khyad gsod dang // gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang // gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cog khyod la bshad par bya// rga dang na
296b4(mdo sde): dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod yin na// nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zos gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga'
296b5(mdo sde): ba legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bar yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor
296b6(mdo sde): ba byas nas ni// thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bus yon
296b7(mdo sde): gyi tshogs 'di sa bu thob pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khama?/
297a1(mdo sde): dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
297a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so// lha sbyin nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ khro bas kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa
297a3(mdo sde): gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig/ de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gi smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das
297a4(mdo sde): ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig/ ces bzlogs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas
297a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro// ro hi ta ka'i bskyed
297a6(mdo sde): mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
297a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas pa na/ lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas
297b1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
297b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
297b3(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgyal po zas
297b4(mdo sde): gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang rjed pa dang / mngon du smra bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyis lhas ni ma
297b5(mdo sde): yin no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po sgra mchog dam chos kyis// char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzod de// mi bzad lam du ltung ba'i
297b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyor bar mdzod// rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' shig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par
297b7(mdo sde): dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go// rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems
298a1(mdo sde): dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
298a2(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das
298a3(mdo sde): las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
298a4(mdo sde): gyis bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams
298a5(mdo sde): pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag
298a6(mdo sde): na rang gis stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang /
298a7(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po'i lus
298b1(mdo sde): las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le bkan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/
298b2(mdo sde): cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed do// lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi spyod nas 'bar bar byed la lus kyi
298b3(mdo sde): smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no//
298b4(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te/ stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa
298b5(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis
298b6(mdo sde): lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa// thub/
298b7(mdo sde): pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bu 'ba' shig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing
299a1(mdo sde): mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/ de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig
299a2(mdo sde): rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs
299a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ sngog chags grog sbur mas ci'i nas kyis pang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par gyur na/ @
299a4(mdo sde): byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gis tshe/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang //
299a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis lta cotse smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
299a6(mdo sde): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par
299a7(mdo sde): bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan das sa'i 'khor dag pas chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po
299b1(mdo sde): che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa nigi sbrul cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang po zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa lha'i dbang po ban+d+ha byin las mnyan te/ n+ya/
299b2(mdo sde): d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi nas 'khod pa ni/ yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags
299b3(mdo sde): skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar sgon ni yul 'khor skyong / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / phrang ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lce phyogs na ni/
299b4(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po// lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//
299b5(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gso
299b6(mdo sde): to/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa rtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
299b7(mdo sde): pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
300a1(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go// ci'i
300a2(mdo sde): phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgyal po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas
300a3(mdo sde): gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bcang/
300a4(mdo sde): khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu/
300a5(mdo sde): mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang /
300a6(mdo sde): gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo // ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos
300a7(mdo sde): 'chang de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang
300b1(mdo sde): du ma 'dug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnamathos kyis bu'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan
300b2(mdo sde): 'das lha 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kyi ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de// bdag gis
300b3(mdo sde): blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gas
300b4(mdo sde): teng ma mthong na/ khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin
300b5(mdo sde): po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang
300b6(mdo sde): mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang /
300b7(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas
301a1(mdo sde): gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon snyam du byas te/ de bden pa
301a2(mdo sde): mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pa chad du brjod pa/ btsun pa phas ma bgyis mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'ongs pa rnams kyis ma
301a3(mdo sde): lags/ dge slong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyisra bdag la mdzad de/ khrag
301a4(mdo sde): dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go// yang
301a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ pa la lan du phan gdags pa// dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang // khyod kyis bdag la mdzad lags te// sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyod kyis bdag ni ngan
301a6(mdo sde): 'gro las// drangs te mtho ris thar pa la// bsgrim mi 'tshal bar gzhag lag ste// khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa lags// mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni// bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar//
301a7(mdo sde): mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi// longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te/ bla gos grags pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa
301b1(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gis dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing /
301b2(mdo sde): mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas
301b3(mdo sde): gnang bar rigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ zad
301b4(mdo sde): dkar la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu rgyal srid thob kyis khyer cig/ ci'i slad du/ ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so// gang gi 'dugs la lags
301b5(mdo sde): de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gis nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so//
301b6(mdo sde): bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du bshad
301b7(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa thong lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smos pa bdag gis tshe
302a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so// gal te de ltar gyur na da /
302a2(mdo sde): zhig rgyal srid la gzhag/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzangs ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyis dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro//
302a3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/ nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/
302a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshed lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza'
302a5(mdo sde): sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
302a6(mdo sde): bkang sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag/
302a7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gis lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i
302b1(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ gser gyis bya ma bum
302b2(mdo sde): blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya go d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ yon sngo bar mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin
302b3(mdo sde): 'dis// shAkya rnams kyi bsams pa yi// yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni// rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
302b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du bsam gtan pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so zhes gdags pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na
302b5(mdo sde): bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol// nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo// rgyal po zas gtsang gi ral pa can lngas rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams
302b6(mdo sde): spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/ dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa
302b7(mdo sde): con 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyis/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na/ 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis com ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las des bsams pa ka shAkya
303a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thams cad sogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur/
303a2(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag
303a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig/ ci thams cad dam/ khyim re re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir
303a4(mdo sde): dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyima'i ma des tu phyung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to// bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa
303a5(mdo sde): dang ming chen no// ming chen ni zhing blas kyis mtha' la lhag par brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
303a6(mdo sde): byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung shig/
303a7(mdo sde): des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig/ bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la
303b1(mdo sde): khyod 'gran ma tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/ de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskul dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po/
303b2(mdo sde): lpags sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro// bu de bzhin du byas te/ yid ches par bya'o// des gzeb stong pa rdze'us bkang nas khwa ras kAr po dkris te/ rgya skyegs la rgyas btub nas bu
303b3(mdo sde): mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri ba dang / ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig/ des de khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
303b4(mdo sde): gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas// des bsams pa rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de/ dang ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/ de'i zan sbyar
303b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o zhes rdze'u de rnams sran chod dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /
303b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo 'o na ni ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur gdon mi za bar 'a
303b7(mdo sde): ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis/ re shig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang / skyed mos tshal thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams
304a1(mdo sde): gnas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so// de ma la gus pa yin pa des ma las zas kyi phung bskur nas spring ba/ yum gdugs chod re re zhing zas ci yin pa zhe/
304a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs so// kyang thong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags s+ho// khyod la khyo mos sngar bsod nams kyis
304a3(mdo sde): dbang thang chen po'i sems cad mI'i bskal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum de bsod nams kyis dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung
304a4(mdo sde): mi ldan yang rung / bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung bar khas len du ma btub bo// de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrog tu
304a5(mdo sde): bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na/ khyod ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug/ des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon gyi mchis
304a6(mdo sde): dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phran yon ci nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma bsgrub
304a7(mdo sde): na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro// khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob bo// ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas thob bo// yum rab kyi/
304b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i yon lags pas/ de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis// gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa
304b2(mdo sde): bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo // de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi wang len te/ bi wang len pa na rgyun chad
304b3(mdo sde): nas sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gags pa pi wang len pa la byeng ba yin pas/ des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de skor bsdad de/ sgor srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la
304b4(mdo sde): rgyal po bzangs ldan la ma 'gags pa lnga'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa lha me 'gags
304b5(mdo sde): pa lnga'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chub sgo na sdod cing mchi so// des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog sa shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa dang
304b6(mdo sde): rgyal pos 'khyud nas pang du bcug ste/ smras pa khyod 'ongs nas ji srid lon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pa na brgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so// de mchog tu ya/
304b7(mdo sde): mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/ khyod paM wang len pa la byang ba yin no// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gas pas smras pa/ lha'i rgyal po zas
305a1(mdo sde): gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas/ de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ rab tu byung ngo // rgyal
305a2(mdo sde): pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ngo to// gres bya ba yod kyis/ khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig/ de de nyid du gnas btab bo// mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri can gyi
305a3(mdo sde): gos kyis gting zhing me tog sil mas bkram po'i mel du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su tshor nas smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod
305a4(mdo sde): dmade rnams kyis btag par brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas/ de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde zhing nyal nas nam mnangs so// rgyal
305a5(mdo sde): bos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa dzi ga bde bar gnyid log gam/ des smras pa NAm+b+ha bde bar gnyid ma log go rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyi ma 'gags pa gnyid ma log/ lha rims bag gi dri can
305a6(mdo sde): gyi gos bting bar me to wi ma e to gi rtsa bas lus snang lags so// rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas/ khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas
305a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so// rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos phrog ste ci bya/ desmras pa/ lha bdag la thag
305b1(mdo sde): pas gtad pa lags so// rgyal pos tha ga pa bkugs nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos 'bul/ tha ga pas smras pa/ lha rnams bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig
305b2(mdo sde): lus pa na/ bdag rims kyis bstab bzhin bgyis pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri/
305b3(mdo sde): lags so// rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gag pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no// de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu
305b4(mdo sde): gal te kho bo rab tu byung na/ lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur te/ de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la/ lha sbyin spro ba bskyed
305b5(mdo sde): par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na khyod ci byed/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa
305b6(mdo sde): gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya ste/ bsla'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan/
305b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe/ bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin
306a1(mdo sde): du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug ka shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/
306a2(mdo sde): 'di ni brdzun du smras pa yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs
306a3(mdo sde): su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga rgya rab tu 'byung bar
306a4(mdo sde): 'gyur gyis thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba bskyod cig ces bsgo'o// lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang / yid mi bde ba skyes nas// gral te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po
306a5(mdo sde): bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur pa dang / bdag khas len por mi 'gyur ba zhig de ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas
306a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam/ ci rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te shAkya rnams kyi bla ma
306a7(mdo sde): 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas/ de grong khyer de gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi rtsa chag chag btab/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po
306b1(mdo sde): dbyangs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar gzhag/ me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go// de nas shAkya brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer
306b2(mdo sde): gyis sgo na seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ shAkya mo dang / shAkya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung 'khol ma can dang / skar khung dang sngags bu dag la 'dug go// shAkya rnams
306b3(mdo sde): kyi 'byor pa la lta bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhag pa dag kyang lam po che dang / tshongs dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'dug goka shAkya la su/
306b4(mdo sde): ngag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ su dag gi ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan dag bkug go/ shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdu bu dang
306b5(mdo sde): dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag la bltas nas/ so so'i shing rtar zhugs te/ phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung
306b6(mdo sde): ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ re ga shig 'dis ni mnyes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba ni de rnams
306b7(mdo sde): kyang mtshan ma khan rnams kyis dung stan to// 7/ de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa
307a1(mdo sde): 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi zla bar ston pa la 'khrus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ko ka li ka dang / khan da drab bya dang / ka ni mo ra tA ka dang
307a2(mdo sde): rgyal dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir byung ba dang / bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras
307a3(mdo sde): nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na/ mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so// de yang de rnams
307a4(mdo sde): kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod zhen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa
307a5(mdo sde): shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gal te ngas
307a6(mdo sde): shAkya rnams la dge sbyong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ kha cig gis mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par
307a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas/ ma langs thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba da
307b1(mdo sde): ba na'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs su gtsug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnamal bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gna'o shAkya rnams gsol ba dang
307b2(mdo sde): bzhi'i las kyis rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to// rgyal po zas
307b3(mdo sde): gtsang gis shAkya rnam kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na/ sku 'dreg par gtang nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po zang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na/ de ngom zum gnag cing
307b4(mdo sde): mchi ma 'dzag cing / skad 'dzer cing dbugs rtsegs bro skra 'dreg par byed do// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur
307b5(mdo sde): ngal bus tshig re re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi de sri pani pami garnamasal yas rten kur mid par 'gyur ba gzhin kya sa sbas te/ ngon pas na sum mi bsngog
307b6(mdo sde): shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying ka'i mas pa rgya brtan zin te/ cho ga gi mya ngan ma byed cig/ ngas ji ltar mi phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed
307b7(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar
308a1(mdo sde): 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la/ bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyun rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen tu ras kyi steng du nog shig/ de rnams kyis so so//
308a2(mdo sde): ngo dang do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan logs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por/
308a3(mdo sde): spungs so// nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te/ de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / nges bsams pa re shig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab
308a4(mdo sde): cang chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis kyang rgyas pa yang spangs nas/ rab tu byung na bdag brgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// galate
308a5(mdo sde): bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag por 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bsal
308a6(mdo sde): ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lon gsum mtshan lan gsum/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
308a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
308b1(mdo sde): 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas/
308b2(mdo sde): sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir/ da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan pa/
308b3(mdo sde): mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na/ bdag rkyen 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/
308b4(mdo sde): bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par
308b5(mdo sde): bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por
308b6(mdo sde): byed pa ma yin/ rus skyong por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por
308b7(mdo sde): byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni// rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad// 'das nas yun ring lon pa yi// las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad// gal te legs par gsung /
309a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po 'dod na tshur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dod dang / bcom ldan 'das
309a2(mdo sde): kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// des khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan yang po me / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
309a3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
309a4(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/
309a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar sgra byi ba dang / snam sbyar
309a6(mdo sde): gyon pa dang / lags pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod
309a7(mdo sde): lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te//
309b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnams ni rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bdud pa byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na
309b2(mdo sde): nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so// de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdung
309b3(mdo sde): pa bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa cho ga la thud cig/ des de'i rkang pa la gtug
309b4(mdo sde): pa nas chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
309b5(mdo sde): nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/
309b6(mdo sde): de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gtugs so// lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis
309b7(mdo sde): thud cig/ de gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag
310a1(mdo sde): go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// de nas ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du/
310a2(mdo sde): tshogs shing / 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes// thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi/
310a3(mdo sde): sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig/
310a4(mdo sde): yin shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shA
310a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / som ldan da 'a dod te du nas/ bco
310a6(mdo sde): makyims ma pa ji skad du lung bsten pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o// de nas ser skya'i gzhan gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das grang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom lda/
310a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos byag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i
310b1(mdo sde): gni'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas/ bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng steg shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig
310b2(mdo sde): yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dro ste/ shes ldan dgra shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes// thog ma ni/
310b3(mdo sde): gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin// rgyu ni ci zhig
310b4(mdo sde): yin shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
310b5(mdo sde): don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu
310b6(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyu ni ci lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
310b7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nges shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs ni/ mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge sbyong go/
311a1(mdo sde): ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid bstod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos la shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las
311a2(mdo sde): brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe//
311a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bung ro rgyab srungs pas re shig de bsal gyis/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dgra
311a4(mdo sde): slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
311a5(mdo sde): tsheche dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas/ snam sbyar bltab ste pangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pas phab ste zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag/
311a6(mdo sde): nas/ snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam
311a7(mdo sde): du sems te/ ma la bdag gis ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu gang yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud
311b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na ka shAkya
311b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyu da shA
311b3(mdo sde): rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs ni/ gang yin pa mthong ngo // mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te//
311b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'di la 'dug go// 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ go'u ta ma dag
